actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility study of a Solar/Hydro Integration Investigation in Arizona and Nevada.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a feasibility study of the integration of solar and hydroelectric power in the lower Colorado River Basin in Arizona and Nevada. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out such study.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility study of a Solar/Hydro Integration Investigation in Arizona and Nevada.
